extension.summary: Provides access to some of the KDE presentations given at conferences
extension.description: This add-on provides access to the KDE presentations that are made available on http://files.kde.org. This includes primarily presentations from Akademy, but also the available presentations from Randa and conf.kde.in. These presentations are simply made available in the same structure as provided. These presentations can be either slideshows, audio or video, so they will only appear in the relevant section in Kodi.
